infos.value: The second division, «Nitor», huh...?
Are they strong?
That's a stupid question.
«Nitor» is led by a red mage o' th' name Adelard. I've heard rumor he's exceptionally strong.
Sounds like fun. Let me be the one to kill him.
Yer can't be serious.
You've got no problem with that, right?
What you do with Hourne does not concern me. However...
Lay a hand on Oelde, and I'll kill you as well.
Well, well. What a merry lot you all are.
Who the hell are you?
They are Dorando and Gargas, loyal subjects of Lord Sadali.
Is that so?
Our words are Lord Sadali's orders!
And don't you forget it, aye!
You gotta problem with that, boy?
Caught Lord Sadali's eye, and now he thinks he's better than us, aye?
I couldn't care less who either of you are.
...What was that?
But hear this. Don't lay a hand on Oelde. Understood?
And what if we refuse, aye? What'll you do then?
I'll send you to your graves.
Heh. Seems like you don't quite know your place yet, boy.
Maybe we ought to teach you a lesson, aye?
Fine by me. Have at me!
I hear you've gutted plenty of monsters in your career.
But humans? That's a different story entirely, aye?
Everyone goes on and on about how great you're supposed to be.
'Bout time they saw you for what you really are, aye?
